data.name: Number of Palindromic Substrings
data.description:
##Summary
Write a function to return the number of palindromic substrings in a given string.

## Details

####Palindrome
A palindrome is a string which is the same forwards as it is backwards.
```
aba
put it up
No 'x' in Nixon
```
For the purposes of this Kata, a string only counts as a palindrome if it is  at least 3 characters long. We will also ignore any non-alphanumeric characters when assessing whether a string is a palindrome (that means ignore punctuation and spaces, but not letters or numbers).

####Substring
A substring is any consecutive series of characters within a string, including the string itself and the empty string.
```
Substrings of 'abcd':
''
'a'
'b'
'c'
'd'
'ab'
'bc'
'cd'
'abc'
'bcd'
'abcd'
```

####Challenge
Write a function that outputs the number of palindromic substrings within it. Be aware that you may have to deal with long strings.

####I/O
You may assume the input will always be of `string` datatype. The output must always be an integer.
